concept.title: Interaction between the default card and use of protected key CPACF

titlealts.navtitle: Interaction between the default card and use of Protected Key CPACF
titlealts.searchtitle: (): Interaction between the default card and use of Protected Key CPACF for

concept.shortdesc: While the CPACF can be used to encrypt and decrypt data in the absence of a , for protected key operations, a is still necessary and it must be the allocated or default adapter for the thread doing the processing.
